EmailTemplate.name: User Groups.January 2015 Singapore UG
EmailTemplate.subject: First Spring User Group of 2015 -- Join us Thursday, January 8 @ 7:00pm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring User Group Join the Singapore Spring User Group for our first 2015 event!
We will be meeting on Thursday, January 8, 2015 at our Spring User Group event. This conference is a free event organised by Pivotal. It will kindly be hosted by Paypal in Suntec. As usual, it will be a great opportunity to meet some fellow passionate developers and learn about new topics.
This month, we will be discussing:
- Transactions with Spring - Messaging for your Spring applications (using JMS or RabbitMQ)
You can register on our meetup group here: http://www.meetup.com/singasug/ Singapore Thursday, January 8, 2015 7:00pm-9:00pm (Singapore, Singapore) Register <http://www.meetup.com/singasug/>
